text.section: Any action of the authority taken under KRS 229.200 may be appealed, and upon appeal an administrative hearing shall be conducted in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B. The authority may provide for hearing officers or impanel not less than three (3) of its members to conduct hearings.
Any party aggrieved by a final order of the authority may appeal to Franklin Circuit Court in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.

law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 11, sec. 15, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 148, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 286, sec. 9, effective July 14, 1992. -- Amended 1976 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 14, sec. 212, effective January 2, 1978. -- Created 1964 Ky. Acts ch. 170, sec. 4.
